Shivah:

"Nope... " answered calmly the bot " I just taking an extra segurity 
measure"

Shivah left the base and the pod moved and followed him . After that, 
the base's doors closed and the Blackfortress dissapeared, one more 
time, under the lava.

"I'm here Wolf, Show you and the antivirus!!!" said Shivah

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine stepped back as he was requested to. "You're afraid of me 
being close to your base?" he tried to supress a laugh, the odds were 
at least a dozen to one against him and the Predacons wanted him to 
step back.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Airshadow Nightlight 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2001 12:16 PM
>   Subject: Re: a pea in a pod
> 
> 
>   Bat probes/Shivah. 
> 
>   Still, the bat probes was wacthing at Lunarpine, when they 
noticed that he was so close of the base they reported it to Shivah. 
> 
>   Shivah opened com link with Lunarpine ans said in a tone that 
meaned that he wasn't in mood "If you don't move 200 meters back, I 
don't leave the base and I'll command to Predacons that kill your 
friends...!" 
> 
>     CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote: 
> 
>     Lunarpine stepped back as the shield dropped. this was the 
moment he'd been
>     waiting for. He would soon meet the reason for all thier 
problems. He didn't
>     know what to expect from either his friends or foes he just 
hoped that he
>     could bluff hi way through this.

>     From: <airly2000@y...>

will
